title: #137 Jay Rayner
itunes:title: #137 Jay Rayner
itunes:subtitle: This week I’m talking to writer, food critic, + host of Out To Lunch, Jay Rayner about his friend David, who died when they were teenagers ❤️ As ever we talk grief, growing up overnight + true acts of kindness.Follow Jay on Twitter @jayrayner1 and y...
description:
This week I’m talking to writer, food critic, + host of Out To Lunch, Jay Rayner about his friend David, who died when they were teenagers ❤️ As ever we talk grief, growing up overnight + true acts of kindness.


Follow Jay on Twitter @jayrayner1 and you can follow Griefcast on Twitter and Instagram @TheGriefcast

Griefcast is hosted by Cariad Lloyd, edited by Kate Holland, recorded at Whistledown Studios (or Cariad's living room in lockdown), artwork is by Jayde Perkin and the music is provided by The Glue Ensemble. And remember, you are not alone.


Rose D'or Nominee 2019, Podcast of the Year 2018, Best Podcast ARIA's 2018.

"the pandemic's most important podcast" Telegraph



Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
